_sText:
******* IMPORTANT ********
Leet Test was updated to version 0.2!
This new version has a more precise scoreboard and an indicator when you reach 100% accuracy. 0.2 also adds anti-cheat features.

Just re-download from the same link below.

Thanks


*************************
Leet Test 0.2 for CS:S 
by MoonQuake
*************************
-READ ALL PLEASE--

So you think you're teh l33t at CS:S and pwn everyone?
Well, show and tell!

This map was made for fun. 1 Player or 2 Players simultaneously!
It's nothing serious and looks pretty simple for better performance on all machines.
It was made so people can compete and show their overall CS:S skills!


You'll be tested for best Aiming Accuracy (%) and Time (min.) using the following:

-Short/medium/long range accuracy
-Sniping accuracy
-Moving targets accuracy
-Recoil control
-Grenade throwing/bouncing
-Ammo managing
-Use of cover
-Crouch-jumping
-Jumping precision
-Performance under stress
-Overall reflexes
-All this as fast as possible! Don't use the clock at the bottom of the screen: when you open the first door, a special timer will start and do the job for you and show the result at the end... if you can even make it there! :)

The timer stops and the results will be shown at the end of the course as soon as you step on the button.

Note1: To redo the test, reload the map or kill yourself (type "kill" in the console")
Note2: Cheating using noclip and such won't help you on this map.

You got the best score and think you pwn us all? Nothing like a screenshot to prove your Leet score is real! :)


------
Looking for a high detailed action-packed bomb defuse map? Look for my latest map "The Matrix 1.1" on all major CS:S web sites like hl2files.com or csbanana.com!
------


----------------
MAP INFORMATION:
----------------

Map Name: aim_leettest
Map Type: AIM (show your skills!)
Release date: October 28th, 2005
Available Weapons: Standard  (pickups)
Map Environment: It's Doctor Kleiner's Counter-Strike Source Testing facility! Alyx guides you!
Map's Time of Day: Day 
Special Features: Use your aiming skills and best moves to make it to the end as fast as possible! You'll have the results of your skils at the end of the course! Aiming accuracy (%) and Time (min.)
Recommended/Maximum Players: 2 max  (you can try the Leet test with a friend!)
Custom Textures Used: no
Custom Sounds Used: no
.NAV File Included (for bots and locations): no, crashes with bots
Tips for this Map: Aim well, be quick.


--------------
INSTALLATION:
--------------

Extract the map (aim_leettest.bsp) directly into your "cstrike/maps" folder.

".../steam/steamapps/username/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps"

Having trouble Unzipping the ZIP? DO NOT use the windows ZIP utility, use Winrar or Winzip.


-----------------------------------------
Known issues with Leet Test:
-----------------------------------------

- Crashes with a bot as far as I know.



Enjoy and have fun! Post your Leet Test results on your favorite web site's forum like the official steampowered.com forums! Post screenshots of your scores because your word is worth nothing in the world of CS:S! ;)


MoonQuake
Level Designer
hl2_moonquake(at)hotmail.com

Want to report a bug or give me some love? Email me!

----------------------------------------------------------
